text: The Pindad G2 is a semi-automatic 9mm pistol designed and produced by PT Pindad, It's also one of Indonesia's handguns. ==Users== * : Used by Bruneian soldiers to compete in the AARM 2020 competition. * : Standard issue secondary for the Indonesian soldiers and the Indonesian police. * : 60 G2 Combat purchased in 2018. ==Sources== Category:Pistols
title: Pindad G2
